variable.name: torque290.tau
variable.comment: Accelerating torque acting at flange (= -flange.tau)

variable.name: J_crank.a
variable.comment: Absolute angular acceleration of component (= der(w))

variable.name: J_crank.phi
variable.comment: Absolute rotation angle of component

variable.name: J_crank.w
variable.comment: Absolute angular velocity of component (= der(phi))

variable.name: Friction_crank.flange_a.tau
variable.comment: Cut torque in the flange

variable.name: Friction_crank.sa
variable.comment: Path parameter of friction characteristic tau = f(a_relfric)

variable.name: Friction_crank.startForward
variable.comment: true, if w_rel=0 and start of forward sliding

variable.name: Friction_crank.startBackward
variable.comment: true, if w_rel=0 and start of backward sliding

variable.name: Friction_crank.locked
variable.comment: true, if w_rel=0 and not sliding

variable.name: Friction_crank.phi
variable.comment: Angle between shaft flanges (flange_a, flange_b) and support

variable.name: Friction_crank.tau
variable.comment: Friction torque

variable.name: Friction_crank.w
variable.comment: Absolute angular velocity of flange_a and flange_b

variable.name: Friction_crank.a
variable.comment: Absolute angular acceleration of flange_a and flange_b

variable.name: product.u1
variable.comment: Connector of Real input signal 1

variable.name: limiter.u
variable.comment: Connector of Real input signal

variable.name: MaxTorque.y[1]
variable.comment: Connector of Real output signals

variable.name: speedSensor.flange.phi
variable.comment: Absolute rotation angle of flange

variable.name: Idle_Redline.u
variable.comment: Connector of Real input signal

variable.name: Idle_Redline.uMin
variable.comment: Lower limits of input signals

variable.name: Idle_Redline.limitsAtInit
variable.comment: = false, if limits are ignored during initializiation (i.e., y=u)

variable.name: Idle_Redline.uMax
variable.comment: Upper limits of input signals

variable.name: MaxTorque.n
variable.comment: Number of inputs (= number of outputs)

variable.name: MaxTorque.columns[1]
variable.comment: columns of table to be interpolated

variable.name: MaxTorque.smoothness
variable.comment: smoothness of table interpolation

variable.name: MaxTorque.fileName
variable.comment: file where matrix is stored

variable.name: MaxTorque.tableName
variable.comment: table name on file or in function usertab (see docu)

variable.name: MaxTorque.table[1,1]
variable.comment: table matrix (grid = first column; e.g., table=[0,2])

variable.name: MaxTorque.tableOnFile
variable.comment: true, if table is defined on file or in function usertab

variable.name: limiter.uMin
variable.comment: Lower limits of input signals

variable.name: limiter.limitsAtInit
variable.comment: = false, if limits are ignored during initializiation (i.e., y=u)

variable.name: limiter.uMax
variable.comment: Upper limits of input signals

variable.name: Scaling.k
variable.comment: Constant output value

variable.name: Friction_crank.peak
variable.comment: peak*tau_pos[1,2] = Maximum friction torque for w==0

variable.name: Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,2]
variable.comment: [w,tau] Positive sliding friction characteristic (w>=0)

variable.name: Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,1]
variable.comment: [w,tau] Positive sliding friction characteristic (w>=0)

variable.name: Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,2]
variable.comment: [w,tau] Positive sliding friction characteristic (w>=0)

variable.name: Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,1]
variable.comment: [w,tau] Positive sliding friction characteristic (w>=0)

variable.name: Friction_crank.Backward
variable.comment: w_rel < 0 (backward sliding)

variable.name: Friction_crank.Stuck
variable.comment: w_rel = 0 (forward sliding, locked or backward sliding)

variable.name: Friction_crank.Forward
variable.comment: w_rel > 0 (forward sliding)

variable.name: Friction_crank.Free
variable.comment: Element is not active

variable.name: Friction_crank.Unknown
variable.comment: Value of mode is not known

variable.name: Friction_crank.w_small
variable.comment: Relative angular velocity near to zero if jumps due to a reinit(..) of the velocity can occur (set to low value only if such impulses can occur)

variable.name: Friction_crank.useSupport
variable.comment: = true, if support flange enabled, otherwise implicitly grounded

variable.name: J_crank.stateSelect
variable.comment: Priority to use phi and w as states

variable.name: J_crank.J
variable.comment: Moment of inertia

variable.name: torque290.useSupport
variable.comment: = true, if support flange enabled, otherwise implicitly grounded

variable.name: Friction_crank.tau0
variable.comment: Friction torque for w=0 and forward sliding

variable.name: Friction_crank.tau0_max
variable.comment: Maximum friction torque for w=0 and locked

variable.name: Friction_crank.free
variable.comment: true, if frictional element is not active

variable.name: Friction_crank.phi_support
variable.comment: Absolute angle of support flange

variable.name: speedSensor.flange.tau
variable.comment: Cut torque in the flange

variable.name: flange_b.tau
variable.comment: Cut torque in the flange

variable.name: torque290.phi_support
variable.comment: Absolute angle of support flange

equations.equation: Friction_crank.tau = if Friction_crank.locked then Friction_crank.sa else if Friction_crank.startForward then Modelica.Math.tempInterpol1(Friction_crank.w,{{Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,1],Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,2]},{Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,1],Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,2]}},2) else if Friction_crank.startBackward then -Modelica.Math.tempInterpol1(-Friction_crank.w,{{Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,1],Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,2]},{Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,1],Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,2]}},2) else if pre(Friction_crank.mode) == 1 then Modelica.Math.tempInterpol1(Friction_crank.w,{{Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,1],Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,2]},{Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,1],Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,2]}},2) else -Modelica.Math.tempInterpol1(-Friction_crank.w,{{Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,1],Friction_crank.tau_pos[1,2]},{Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,1],Friction_crank.tau_pos[2,2]}},2)

Friction_crank.startForward = pre(Friction_crank.mode) == 0 and (Friction_crank.sa > Friction_crank.tau0_max or pre(Friction_crank.startForward) and Friction_crank.sa > Friction_crank.tau0) or pre(Friction_crank.mode) == -1 and Friction_crank.w > Friction_crank.w_small or initial() and Friction_crank.w > 0.0

Friction_crank.startBackward = pre(Friction_crank.mode) == 0 and (Friction_crank.sa < -Friction_crank.tau0_max or pre(Friction_crank.startBackward) and Friction_crank.sa < -Friction_crank.tau0) or pre(Friction_crank.mode) == 1 and Friction_crank.w < -Friction_crank.w_small or initial() and Friction_crank.w < 0.0
Friction_crank.locked = not (pre(Friction_crank.mode) == 1 or Friction_crank.startForward or pre(Friction_crank.mode) == -1 or Friction_crank.startBackward)

Friction_crank.a = if Friction_crank.locked then 0.0 else if Friction_crank.startForward then Friction_crank.sa - Friction_crank.tau0_max else if Friction_crank.startBackward then Friction_crank.sa + Friction_crank.tau0_max else if pre(Friction_crank.mode) == 1 then Friction_crank.sa - Friction_crank.tau0_max else Friction_crank.sa + Friction_crank.tau0_max

Friction_crank.mode = if (pre(Friction_crank.mode) == 1 or pre(Friction_crank.mode) == 2 or Friction_crank.startForward) and Friction_crank.w > 0.0 then 1 else if (pre(Friction_crank.mode) == -1 or pre(Friction_crank.mode) == 2 or Friction_crank.startBackward) and Friction_crank.w < 0.0 then -1 else 0

0.0 = if initial() and not limiter.limitsAtInit then product.u1 - limiter.u else product.u1 - (if limiter.u > limiter.uMax then limiter.uMax else if limiter.u < limiter.uMin then limiter.uMin else limiter.u)

0.0 = if initial() and not Idle_Redline.limitsAtInit then feedback.u1 - Idle_Redline.u else feedback.u1 - (if Idle_Redline.u > Idle_Redline.uMax then Idle_Redline.uMax else if Idle_Redline.u < Idle_Redline.uMin then Idle_Redline.uMin else Idle_Redline.u)
equations.whenEquation:
MaxTorque.tableID := Modelica.Blocks.Tables.CombiTable1D.tableInit(if MaxTorque.tableOnFile then MaxTorque.tableName else "NoName",if MaxTorque.tableOnFile then MaxTorque.fileName else "NoName",{{MaxTorque.table[1,1],MaxTorque.table[1,2]},{MaxTorque.table[2,1],MaxTorque.table[2,2]},{MaxTorque.table[3,1],MaxTorque.table[3,2]},{MaxTorque.table[4,1],MaxTorque.table[4,2]},{MaxTorque.table[5,1],MaxTorque.table[5,2]},{MaxTorque.table[6,1],MaxTorque.table[6,2]},{MaxTorque.table[7,1],MaxTorque.table[7,2]},{MaxTorque.table[8,1],MaxTorque.table[8,2]},{MaxTorque.table[9,1],MaxTorque.table[9,2]},{MaxTorque.table[10,1],MaxTorque.table[10,2]},{MaxTorque.table[11,1],MaxTorque.table[11,2]},{MaxTorque.table[12,1],MaxTorque.table[12,2]},{MaxTorque.table[13,1],MaxTorque.table[13,2]},{MaxTorque.table[14,1],MaxTorque.table[14,2]},{MaxTorque.table[15,1],MaxTorque.table[15,2]},{MaxTorque.table[16,1],MaxTorque.table[16,2]},{MaxTorque.table[17,1],MaxTorque.table[17,2]},{MaxTorque.table[18,1],MaxTorque.table[18,2]},{MaxTorque.table[19,1],MaxTorque.table[19,2]},{MaxTorque.table[20,1],MaxTorque.table[20,2]},{MaxTorque.table[21,1],MaxTorque.table[21,2]},{MaxTorque.table[22,1],MaxTorque.table[22,2]},{MaxTorque.table[23,1],MaxTorque.table[23,2]},{MaxTorque.table[24,1],MaxTorque.table[24,2]},{MaxTorque.table[25,1],MaxTorque.table[25,2]},{MaxTorque.table[26,1],MaxTorque.table[26,2]},{MaxTorque.table[27,1],MaxTorque.table[27,2]},{MaxTorque.table[28,1],MaxTorque.table[28,2]},{MaxTorque.table[29,1],MaxTorque.table[29,2]},{MaxTorque.table[30,1],MaxTorque.table[30,2]},{MaxTorque.table[31,1],MaxTorque.table[31,2]},{MaxTorque.table[32,1],MaxTorque.table[32,2]},{MaxTorque.table[33,1],MaxTorque.table[33,2]},{MaxTorque.table[34,1],MaxTorque.table[34,2]},{MaxTorque.table[35,1],MaxTorque.table[35,2]},{MaxTorque.table[36,1],MaxTorque.table[36,2]},{MaxTorque.table[37,1],MaxTorque.table[37,2]},{MaxTorque.table[38,1],MaxTorque.table[38,2]},{MaxTorque.table[39,1],MaxTorque.table[39,2]},{MaxTorque.table[40,1],MaxTorque.table[40,2]},{MaxTorque.table[41,1],MaxTorque.table[41,2]},{MaxTorque.table[42,1],MaxTorque.table[42,2]},{MaxTorque.table[43,1],MaxTorque.table[43,2]},{MaxTorque.table[44,1],MaxTorque.table[44,2]},{MaxTorque.table[45,1],MaxTorque.table[45,2]}},MaxTorque.smoothness)
0
